thread.title: EastEnders spoiler: Ian Beale's exit REVEALED? Soap hero threatened with 'death sentence'
thread.title_full: EastEnders spoiler: Ian Beale's exit REVEALED? Soap hero threatened with 'death sentence'

title: EastEnders spoiler: Ian Beale's exit REVEALED? Soap hero threatened with 'death sentence'
text:
BBC EastEnders spoiler: Ian Beale's exit REVEALED? Soap hero threatened with 'death sentence' Dealing with prostate cancer in your family and #EastEnders is going to run a story line with Ian Beale to have prostate problem #DoItRight. EastEnders viewer 
Deciding to cancel an appointment with his GP, Ian is forced to open up to wife Jane Beale (Laurie Brett) about results given to him by the nurse. 
Fearing the worst, the couple decide to make drastic lifestyle changes - but viewers will not be told exactly what is wrong with Ian. 
EastEnders producers are keeping tight-lipped on Ian's health secret, but in true soap style, it can only be bad news. 
Viewers have been keeping a close eye on Ian after he fell asleep in the Queen Vic, forcing Mick Carter (Danny Dyer) to wake him up. BBC EastEnders: Ian Beale visits the doctor Soap stars then and now Wed, February 1, 2017 From EastEnders' longest running character Ian Beale, to Coronation Street's Sarah Platt, take a look and see how much these soap stars have changed.
